company.label: Company that will pay for the order

primary_market.label: Country where the service is required

subscribers.hint: People who need to be kept informed about this order, for example, international trade advisers or language advisors.
subscribers.label: Adviser

description.label: Description of the work or activity

use_sector_from_company.label: Do you want to use the company’s primary sector (shown above) for this order?

contacts_not_to_approach.label: Specific people or organisations the company does not want DBT to talk to

existing_agents.label: Contacts the company already has in the market
existing_agents.hint: For example partners, suppliers or distributors

further_info.label: Internal notes and useful information
further_info.hint: For example specific client requirements, market and distribution strategies or key deadlines

assignees.hint: For example post advisers or other in-country staff
assignees.label: Adviser

vat_status.label: VAT category
vat_status.hint: Choose a VAT category based on the billing address country

vat_verified.label: Has a valid VAT number been supplied?

verify_work_sent.label: Work has been sent to the contact

quote.service_types: Choose at least one service type the order covers
quote.description: Add a description of the work or activity
quote.delivery_date: Set a delivery date of at least 21 days from now
quote.assignees: Add at least one adviser in the market
quote.assignee_time: Allocate hours to at least one adviser in the market
quote.vat_number: Enter the EU company’s VAT number
quote.vat_verified: Verify the EU company’s VAT number

validation.duration: must be a whole number, for example 5
validation.greaterthanamount: must be equal to or larger than the invoice amount
validation.euvatnumber: must be a valid EU VAT number starting with the country code, for example IT12345678901 for Italy where "IT" is the country code
